name: Debtors Report
query:
SELECT 	si.name AS "Invoice No:Link/Sales Invoice:150", 
		si.cost_center AS "Cost Center:Link/Cost Center:180", 
		si.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:150", 
		GROUP_CONCAT(sid.item_name) AS "Items:Data:200",
		si.from_date AS "From Date:Date:100", 
		si.to_date AS "To Date:Date:100", 
		si.due_date AS "Due Date:Date:100", 
		ROUND(IF(si.currency = "USD", IF (si.currency = si.party_account_currency, si.outstanding_amount,si.outstanding_amount/si.conversion_rate), ""),2) AS "USD:Float:100", 
		ROUND(IF(si.currency = "TZS", IF (si.currency = si.party_account_currency, si.outstanding_amount, si.outstanding_amount), ""),2) AS "TZS:Float:100",
		si._user_tags as "Remarks:Data:200"
FROM `tabSales Invoice` si LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` as sid ON si.name = sid.parent
WHERE si.status IN ("Sumitted", "Unpaid", "Overdue")
